segment.source: Deploying MBAM 2.5 Group Policy Objects
segment.target: Deploying MBAM 2.5 Group Policy Objects

segment.source: Deploying MBAM 2.5 Group Policy Objects
segment.target: Deploying MBAM 2.5 Group Policy Objects

segment.source: Deploying MBAM 2.5 Group Policy Objects
segment.target: Deploying MBAM 2.5 Group Policy Objects

segment.source: To deploy MBAM, you have to set Group Policy settings that define MBAM implementation settings for BitLocker drive encryption.
segment.target: To deploy MBAM, you have to set Group Policy settings that define MBAM implementation settings for BitLocker drive encryption.

segment.source: To complete this task, you must copy the MBAM Group Policy Templates to a server or workstation that are capable of running Group Policy Management Console (GPMC) or Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM), and then edit the settings.
segment.target: To complete this task, you must copy the MBAM Group Policy Templates to a server or workstation that are capable of running Group Policy Management Console (GPMC) or Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM), and then edit the settings.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: Do not change the Group Policy settings in the BitLocker Drive Encryption node, or MBAM will not work correctly.
segment.target: Do not change the Group Policy settings in the BitLocker Drive Encryption node, or MBAM will not work correctly.

segment.source: When you configure the Group Policy settings in the MDOP MBAM (BitLocker Management) node, MBAM automatically configures the BitLocker Drive Encryption settings for you.
segment.target: When you configure the Group Policy settings in the MDOP MBAM (BitLocker Management) node, MBAM automatically configures the BitLocker Drive Encryption settings for you.

segment.source: Copying the MBAM 2.5 Group Policy Templates
segment.target: Copying the MBAM 2.5 Group Policy Templates

segment.source: Before you install the MBAM Client, you must copy MBAM-specific Group Policy Objects (GPOs) to the Management Workstation.
segment.target: Before you install the MBAM Client, you must copy MBAM-specific Group Policy Objects (GPOs) to the Management Workstation.

segment.source: These GPOs define MBAM implementation settings for BitLocker drive encryption.
segment.target: These GPOs define MBAM implementation settings for BitLocker drive encryption.

segment.source: You can copy the Group Policy templates to any server or workstation that is a supported Windows server or client computer and that is able to run the Group Policy Management Console (GPMC) or Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM).
segment.target: You can copy the Group Policy templates to any server or workstation that is a supported Windows server or client computer and that is able to run the Group Policy Management Console (GPMC) or Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM).

segment.source: Copying the MBAM 2.5 Group Policy Templates
segment.target: Copying the MBAM 2.5 Group Policy Templates

segment.source: Editing MBAM 2.0 GPO settings
segment.target: Editing MBAM 2.0 GPO settings

segment.source: After you create the necessary GPOs, you must deploy the MBAM Group Policy settings to your organization’s client computers.
segment.target: After you create the necessary GPOs, you must deploy the MBAM Group Policy settings to your organization’s client computers.

segment.source: To view and create GPOs, you must have Group Policy Management Console (GPMC) or Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) installed.
segment.target: To view and create GPOs, you must have Group Policy Management Console (GPMC) or Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) installed.

segment.source: Editing the MBAM 2.5 Group Policy Settings
segment.target: Editing the MBAM 2.5 Group Policy Settings

segment.source: Showing or hiding the MBAM Control Panel in Windows Control Panel
segment.target: Showing or hiding the MBAM Control Panel in Windows Control Panel

segment.source: Since MBAM offers a customized MBAM control panel that can replace the default Windows BitLocker control panel, you can also choose to show or hide the default BitLocker Control Panel from end users by using Group Policy settings.
segment.target: Since MBAM offers a customized MBAM control panel that can replace the default Windows BitLocker control panel, you can also choose to show or hide the default BitLocker Control Panel from end users by using Group Policy settings.

segment.source: Hiding the Default BitLocker Drive Encryption Item in Control Panel
segment.target: Hiding the Default BitLocker Drive Encryption Item in Control Panel
